channel.title: Need help On crowns please
channel.description: right title says it all, the donator crown, Is ment to be a mod crown -.-

item.title: Need help On crowns please
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:2, topic:397511”]The belongs in Client Help. This is very simple, just download another client, go into it’s sprites, and it will have a whole bunch of

interfaces(including a mod crown). So go into your sprites, go to that donator crown>right click>open

with>paint. You’ll see that there’s a paste from option somewhere up top, click that. Then go to the other

you have downloaded and double click the mod crown that it has. There you go, it has been pasted over the donator crown.

Remember to save it then compile.[/quote]

I have the mod crown in my client though, yet it Mod shows up as donator crown? :s

Read full topic

item.title: Need help On crowns please
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

The belongs in Client Help. This is very simple, just download another client, go into it’s sprites, and it will have a whole bunch of

interfaces(including a mod crown). So go into your sprites, go to that donator crown>right click>open

with>paint. You’ll see that there’s a paste from option somewhere up top, click that. Then go to the other

you have downloaded and double click the mod crown that it has. There you go, it has been pasted over the donator crown.

Remember to save it then compile.

Read full topic
